overview:
An amateur player. He is a football player hoping to get the opportunity to become a professional football player in the nearest future.he has all the quality to becoming one of the best football players of his generation. He is from Africa,Nigeria to be precise,and he is ever ready to any trails in europe .He is physically strong,and healthy. He plays from the position of central midfield,and can as well play from any other
position.He plays with both of his foot,very confident in the field of play with the ball,as the strength to mark,and tackle very well,and he can last along time in the field of play.He is seriously looking forward to the day he will get the opportunity to show what bundle of talent he has got in the game of football. Please if there is any football agent,or club willing to give an opportunity for trials he will be most grateful. You can contact him on this e-mail(showboi14@yahoo.com,showboislife@gmail.com),or call him on this phone number(+2348071374293).

Thanks Yours Faithful in the game of football.
